item.title: Gemini Mobile App Surpasses Coinbase on the App Store Top Charts
item.description: On August 26th, as reported by Cointelegraph, after the launch of its XRP Mastercard by Gemini, Gemini has overtaken Coinbase in the top charts of the US App Store. Currently, Gemini holds the 16th position, while Coinbase is ranked 20th.

item.title: Eclipse Lays Off 65% of Staff, Former CEO Steps Down Voluntarily
item.description: August 26th. The Ethereum Layer2 network Eclipse announced today a restructuring of the team and leadership in order to adapt to the new development direction after TGE. As part of this transition, sydney will assume the role of CEO following Litquidity's voluntary departure. To align resources with the updated strategy, the team has reduced its staff by 65%. Eclipse's mission remains to bring Web2-level applications onto the blockchain.As of the time of this publication, Eclipse's native token ES has a reported market capitalization of $23.83 million. It has experienced a 7.8% decrease in the last 24 hours, a 5.9% decrease in the past 7 days, and a 32.2% decrease in the past 30 days.

item.title: Bitcoin Withdrawals Slowing Down, CEX Net Inflow of 296.76 BTC in the Last 24 Hours
item.description: On August 26th, according to Coinglass data, within the past 24 hours, the total net inflow of BTC on CEXs was 296.76 BTC. The top three CEXs in terms of inflow volume are as follows:· Bitfinex: a net inflow of 1,202.72 BTC;· Kraken: a net inflow of 600.19 BTC;· Bybit: a net inflow of 473.74 BTC.In addition, Binance had a net outflow of 2,344.92 BTC and ranked first on the outflow list.

item.title: Binance CEO: Beware of Fake Binance Customer Service Call Scams Involving Guiding API Changes
item.description: On August 26th, Richard Teng, the CEO of Binance, posted that the Binance team recently uncovered a scam. In this scam, fake Binance customer service makes calls to users, asking them to modify their API. Scammers use spoofed numbers or VoIP technology to get in touch with users and claim, "Your Binance account may be in danger. We need to adjust your API settings right away to ensure the safety of your funds." After that, the scammers use the newly obtained permission to start withdrawal operations and directly transfer the cryptocurrency to a wallet under their control.

item.title: Upbit Trading Volume Slightly Retreats: ETH, BTC, XRP Remain Top Three
item.description: On August 26th, based on CoinGecko data, in the past 24 hours, Upbit's trading volume saw a slight decrease to $3.274 billion, with a 4.3% reduction. Among them, the ETH/KRW trading pair led the Korean won market with a 19.78% trading volume share. Subsequently, BTC, XRP, USDT, and SOL ranked in the top five.

item.title: The SharpLink total market value has dropped below its ETH holdings value.
item.description: On August 26th, according to crypto KOL AB Kuai.Dong, the current total market value of "Ethereum Micro Strategy" SharpLink is $3.237 billion. Meanwhile, the company's holdings of ETH amount to a total value of $3.28 billion. This indicates that the NAV is less than 1 (trading at a discount).On the other hand, in the same sector, Bitmine has a total market value of $8.605 billion, and its holdings of ETH are worth $7.59 billion.

item.title: Cyber Crash Token CCC Completes TGE, Surges 70.3% Within 1 Hour of Listing
item.description: August 26th. The Cyber Crash Token CCC, incubated by MetaCene, has completed its TGE on Pancake and officially opened the token distribution channel for testing players. During the first hour of trading, the CCC price surged by 70.3% and is now trading at 0.034 USDT.It is reported that Cyber Crash will commence its open beta testing for the mobile game on August 28th. The official will provide a two-week test with a total reward pool of 2 million CCC tokens. On September 2nd, the web-based gameplay Cyber Forge will also become live. Players can now pre-register for the game on the official website and claim their rewards.

item.title: Matrixport: Bitcoin Rally Restrained Due to Funding and Seasonal Factors
item.description: On August 26th, Matrixport disclosed its daily chart analysis, indicating that "Most institutional funds have withdrawn from the summer. However, Ethereum still attracts inflows, while Bitcoin ETF may experience net outflows for the fifth consecutive month. This month's outflow is estimated to be around $1.2 billion, which is the second highest in history, only next to February's $3.5 billion. Seasonal factors may be temporary, but they serve as a reminder: Fund flows are as important as seasonality.""After maintaining a bullish attitude in July, we became cautious in August. Although macro and liquidity factors may still provide support for Bitcoin, the current market still needs to remain vigilant."

item.title: Binance Alpha has now launched TOWN
item.description: August 26th. Binance Alpha has now made TOWN (Alt.town) available for listing.

item.title: Bitunix Analyst: Trump Claims to Fire Fed Governor, Impacting Central Bank Independence; BTC Liquidity Shifts Downward, Faces $114,000 Resistance
item.description: August 26th: On August 26th, President Trump publicly declared that he had dismissed Federal Reserve Board member Lisa Cook. Cook responded by saying, "I do not possess the authority to be dismissed, and I will not resign." This unprecedented action has heightened concerns regarding the Fed's independence and the policy trajectory heading into the September meeting, leading to a weaker dollar and an increased sense of risk aversion.On the crypto front, the BTC heat map indicates a withdrawal of liquidity from the upper limit. There is a concentrated cluster of orders and a potential liquidation zone between 114,000 and 117,000 above, which poses as a significant resistance. The support below is observed around 109,000–108,000, with short-term volatility risks on the rise.Bitunix analyst's recommendation: This event constitutes a systemic shock to central bank independence, amplifying policy signal noise. The market's pricing of the "rate cut pace" is likely to be more volatile. It
